scopecontent.p: This is a scrapbook of clippings on prison systems, including articles on prison discipline, American and European prisons, and the proposal to build a new "common jail" in Schuylkill County, Pennsylvania. Clippings are from various newspapers, including the Philadelphia Inquirer, the Evening Bulletin, the Public Ledger, and the Mining Register of Pottsville, Schuylkill County. Clippings date from 1844 to 1852. The bookplate says "From the Library of the Pennsylvania Prison Society" (formerly the Pennsylvania Society for Alleviating the Miseries of Public Prisons).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
